person.persName: H. D. Helm (Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, brick mason, sheriff and real estate dealer)

body.p: Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, brick mason, sheriff and real estate dealer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Helm. Father of Florence Helm, Frank Helm, Susan Helm, Mary Helm, Edwin Helm, Louisa Helm. Brick mason in Newport, Campbell County in 1850. Sheriff in Newport, Campbell County, in 1860. Arrested on suspicion of disloyalty to the US government in Campbell County in 1862. Prisoner at Camp Chase in Columbus, Ohio in 1862. Real estate dealer in Campbell County in 1863.
